Players¶

class coop.players.CoopPlayer(initial_position, goal_positions, walls, goal_choice=<class 'coop.strategies.NaiveStrategy'>)[source]¶

Class representing a cooperative player that handles collisions on a rolling basis

Attributes:
CUT_OFF_LIMIT
next

Calculates this agent’s next position considering its current

next_position

Calculates this agent’s position according to its next step without

others

The list of all the cooperative peers of this agent

Methods

add_goal(goal_position) Adds a new goal for this agent
collision(placed, simultaneous) Checks that there would be no collisions had the agents continued as usual, and returns a potential collision
find_path_to_goal([placed, resume]) Finds a path to a goal considering players already fixed on the grid
get_next_position() Pops the next step out of the list and takes it to calculate its next position
get_position_after(reversed_steps) Calculates this agent’s position if the given step list were to be followed in the reversed manner

has_next_step() Tests whether this agent has a planified step to take

set_cut_off_limit(cut_point) Sets the number of immediate steps to be recalculated when handling a collision
add_goal(goal_position)[source]¶

Adds a new goal for this agent

args:
goal_position (tuple[int]): the coordinates of a new goal for the agent
collision(placed, simultaneous)[source]¶

Checks that there would be no collisions had the agents continued as usual, and returns a potential collision

args:
placed (list[CoopPlayer]): the list of players already placed
likely to collide with this agent
simultaneous (list[CoopPlayer]): the list of players to be placed
at the same time or after this player likely to collide with it
return:
(tuple[int]): the position of a potential collision,
otherwise (NoneType)
find_path_to_goal(placed=[], resume=False)[source]¶

Finds a path to a goal considering players already fixed on the grid

args:
[optional] placed (list[CoopPlayer]): the list of players already
placed that need to be avoided
[optional] resume (bool): True iff the agent must resume its pursuit
of the current goal
get_next_position()[source]¶

Pops the next step out of the list and takes it to calculate its next position

return:
(tuple[int]): the next position of the agent
get_position_after(reversed_steps)[source]¶

Calculates this agent’s position if the given step list were to be followed in the reversed manner

args:
reversed_steps (list[tuple[int]]): the reversed list of steps to take
return:
(tuple[int]): this agent’s position after taking the given steps
get_valid_shifts(obstacles)[source]¶

Finds all of the valid neighbours of this node, i.e. those nodes wrapping non-wall and inside-the-grid cells

args:
obstacles (list[tuple[int]]): the coordinates of obstacles to be
avoided
return:
(list[Node]): the list of all this node’s valid neighbours
go_through_one_another(other)[source]¶

Tests whether this agent and the given one go would go through one another had no collision check been made

args:
other (Node): the node to check
return:
(bool): True iff the next position of this agent is the current
position of the other, and vice versa
handle_collision(obstacle)[source]¶

Recalculates a part of its immediate path considering the given obstacle

args:
obstacle (tuple[int]): the coordinates of an obstacle to be
considered when recalculating its path
has_next_goal()[source]¶

Tests whether this agent has a goal to pursue

return:
(bool): True iff the list of goals is not empty
has_next_step()[source]¶

Tests whether this agent has a planified step to take

return:
(bool): True iff the list of planified steps is not empty
is_at_goal()[source]¶

Tests whether this agent has arrived at its goal

return:
(bool): True iff the agent is currently at its goal position
next¶

Calculates this agent’s next position considering its current and remaining goals, and any potential collisions

return:
(tuple[int]): the next position of the agent
next_position¶

Calculates this agent’s position according to its next step without popping it out

return:
(tuple[int]): the next position of the agent
others¶

The list of all the cooperative peers of this agent

return:
(list[CoopPlayer], list[CoopPlayer]): the list of the cooperative
peers already placed during this iteration, and the list of those yet to be placed
classmethod set_cut_off_limit(cut_point)[source]¶

Sets the number of immediate steps to be recalculated when handling a collision
